nodes.title: Cloud Native API Gateway powered by Apache APISIX

overview.overview: Apache APISIX 是一个动态、实时、高性能的云原生 API 网关，提供了负载均衡、动态上游、灰度发布、服务熔断、身份认证、可观测性等丰富的流量管理功能。

childMarkdownRemark.html: Apache APISIX is based on NGINX and etcd. Compared with traditional API Gateways, APISIX has features like dynamic routing and hot-loading plugins, etc.
